statements: SELECT * FROM text_data_for_nlp;
SELECT id, text_data FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE task_type = 'classification';
SELECT text_data, task_type FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE task_type = 'translation' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, text_data, task_type FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE task_type = 'classification';
SELECT id, text_data FROM text_data_for_nlp ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT task_type, COUNT(*) FROM text_data_for_nlp GROUP BY task_type;
SELECT * FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_data FROM text_data WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, original_text_id, processed_text FROM processed_text WHERE processed_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM text_data ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, text_data, created_at FROM text_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, text_data, created_at FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_data, created_at, id FROM text_data WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, text_data FROM text_data WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT processed_text, created_at FROM processed_text JOIN text_data ON processed_text.original_text_id = text_data.id WHERE processed_text.created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY text_data.id ASC;
SELECT id, process_text FROM processed_text WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) AND LENGTH(processed_text) > 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Document;
SELECT id, text, created_at FROM Token ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, text, language FROM Document WHERE language='en' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name, created_at FROM Entity WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT token_id, COUNT(id) AS token_count FROM Entity GROUP BY token_id HAVING token_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM Token WHERE id = 'fd52611d-1c72-42d5-bab2-4c2271bba363';
SELECT name, created_at FROM Entity WHERE token_id = '289f0c13-0139-4c22-8cb4-9b44c7d12494' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, value FROM Token WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Document.id, Document.text, Token.value, Entity.name FROM Document JOIN Token ON Document.id = Token.document_id JOIN Entity ON Token.id = Entity.token_id;
SELECT language, COUNT(*) FROM Document GROUP BY language HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM text_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, data FROM text_data_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author FROM document_table ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT word FROM word_table WHERE document_id = 10;
SELECT content FROM sentence_table WHERE document_id = 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM text_data_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, data FROM text_data_table WHERE name LIKE '%keyword%' AND timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT title, author FROM document_table WHERE is_processed = TRUE ORDER BY author, title;
SELECT w.word, d.title FROM word_table w JOIN document_table d ON w.document_id = d.id WHERE w.word IN ('apple', 'orange', 'banana') ORDER BY d.title ASC, w.word DESC;
SELECT s.content, d.title FROM sentence_table s JOIN document_table d ON s.document_id = d.id WHERE d.author = 'John Doe' AND s.content LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM text_documents;
SELECT id, document_text FROM text_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_id, sentence_text FROM sentences WHERE document_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sentence_id, word_text FROM words WHERE sentence_id = 3 LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM documents_metadata WHERE document_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM text_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sentence_text FROM sentences WHERE document_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT word_text, tag FROM words INNER JOIN word_tags ON words.id = word_tags.word_id WHERE words.sentence_id = 3;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM documents_metadata WHERE document_id = 4 AND metadata_key LIKE 'author%';
SELECT document_text FROM text_documents WHERE id = 5 OR id = 6;
